1.name: Abhorrent Cologne
1.effect: Enemies have less health, but enemy damage is increased!

2.name: Absorption Coil
2.effect: A percentage of damage taken charges your signature arcana!

3.name: Agni's Sparkler
3.effect: Increases ferocity of your burn status effects!

5.name: Alchemist's Stone
5.effect: All Chaos Gems gained during the Chaos Trials are transmuted into gold!

8.name: Anchor of Burden
8.effect: Damage and stuns are increased but movement speed is reduced for each cursed relic owned!

9.name: Ancient Fountain Pen
9.effect: Your charged signature arcana deals more damage every time you use it!

10.name: Antiquated Tabi
10.effect: Adds a small chance to evade attacks!

11.name: Arcana Rewards Card
11.effect: All gold costs for arcana are discounted!

12.name: Armor of Greed
12.effect: Grants a significant boost in armor! Every hit taken reduces gold count.

13.name: Armor of Resolve
13.effect: Increases armor while at low health!

15.name: Auditor's Talisman
15.effect: Increases critical hit chance at low health!

16.name: Auger of Poetry
16.effect: Increases resistance to earth based attacks!

17.name: Autograph Pad
17.effect: Damage and movement speed is increased while signature arcana is charged!

19.name: Berserker's Axe
19.effect: Increases damage dealt for a short while after taking damage!

20.name: Berserker's Helm
20.effect: Damage increased while at low health!

21.name: Bladed Buckler
21.effect: Destroying an enemy projectile grants signature charge energy!

22.name: Blasting Sprite Aura
22.effect: Summons a sprite that slows enemies!

23.name: Boots of Frenzy
23.effect: Defeating enemies grants a chance to temporarily add unlimited charges to your movement arcana!

24.name: Bracers of the Beast
24.effect: Pressing forward into an attack immediately before impact allows you to guard the attack!

25.name: Broken Plague Flask
25.effect: Enemy max health is lowered, but your health is lowered as well!

26.name: C-99 Piggy Bank
26.effect: Gets heavier as you progress through the trials. Drop from inventory to open.

27.name: Calcifying Bonemail
27.effect: Increases armor for a short duration after taking damage!

28.name: Calvin's Sandy Shoes
28.effect: Adds a chance to evade while at low health!

29.name: Captain's Ring
29.effect: Equipping arcana of differing elements increases damage!

30.name: Cartographer's Quill
30.effect: Increases damage based on how much of the map you have revealed! Damage increase lasts for the entire trial!

31.name: Chaos Scanner
31.effect: Reveals health bars for all enemies in the Chaos Trials!

32.name: Charming Teddy Bear
32.effect: Adds a chance to charm enemies when taking damage!

33.name: Cobalt Firestone
33.effect: Summons an aura that damages nearby enemies!

34.name: Combo Gloves
34.effect: Basic arcana have an extra combo!

35.name: Conqueror's Belt
35.effect: All Rogues and Archers have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.

36.name: Conqueror's Cloak
36.effect: All Mages and Summoners have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.

37.name: Conqueror's Helmet
37.effect: All Knights and Lancers have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.

38.name: Covert Ops Mask
38.effect: After evading an attack, all of your attacks will be critical hits for a short duration!

39.name: Crimson Clover
39.effect: Critical hit chance is increased for you and all enemies!

40.name: Critical Placebos
40.effect: Makes you believe all your attacks result in critical hits!

41.name: Cushioned Flip-flops
41.effect: Damage taken is expended from your signature meter while you have sufficient charge to shield the attack!

42.name: Dagger of Midas
42.effect: Increases damage based on how much gold you currently have!

43.name: Dark Katana
43.effect: Designed by Artisan Mathosse Feadur, this relic triples the critical hit chance for all melee arcana!

44.name: Dated Sunglasses
44.effect: Enemy projectiles move slower, giving you more time to react!

45.name: Deafening Cymbals
45.effect: Destroys all projectiles in the area when hit by a projectile!

46.name: Demi's Teapot
46.effect: Increases the duration of buff arcana!

48.name: Devi's Bug Spray
48.effect: Increases potency of your poison status effects!

49.name: Dice of the Nemesis
49.effect: Adds a small chance of dealing massive damage with your critical hits!

50.name: Double Edged Cestus
50.effect: Increase basic arcana damage! All other damage decreased.

51.name: Double Toil
51.effect: Reduces cooldowns by half but receive double damage!

52.name: Double Trouble
52.effect: Deal double damage but receive double damage!

53.name: Ebon Wolf's Cloak
53.effect: Increases fire and lightning arcana damage, but receive more damage from water and earth attacks!

54.name: Elemental Pointes
54.effect: Using a dash arcana immediately after another arcana lowers cooldowns for all arcana of the same element as your dash!

55.name: Elven Ears
55.effect: Remaining motionless for a short time causes you to disappear from sight!

56.name: Equestricap
56.effect: Designed by Artisan Tacobowl8, this relic allows you to look quite dashing as you gallop to max speed with ease!

58.name: Evening Gloves
58.effect: Basic arcana chains are completed automatically!

59.name: Flak Gauntlet
59.effect: Allows you to destroy enemy projectiles with melee basic arcana!

60.name: Flashy Boots
60.effect: Allows you to triple dash but lowers movement speed!

61.name: Fortune Cookie
61.effect: Randomly empowers an arcana at the beginning of each stage!

62.name: Freezing Sprite Naya
62.effect: Summons a sprite that freezes enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.

63.name: Friendship Bracelet
63.effect: Increase damage and movement speed when you're with a true friend!

67.name: Glass Cannon
67.effect: Damage increased but max health is reduced!

68.name: Glove of Midas
68.effect: Increase gold gain for all wizards! Multiple gloves do not stack.

69.name: Golden Armor of Envy
69.effect: Increases armor but store prices are increased!

70.name: Golden Saber of Envy
70.effect: Increases damage but store prices are increased!

71.name: Greased Boots
71.effect: Increases the distances traveled by dash arcana!

72.name: Grimoire of Ruin
72.effect: Increases the damage of summoned agents!

74.name: Health Care Card
74.effect: Receive a discount whenever you purchase potions from the merchant!

75.name: Heavy Travel Jacket
75.effect: Increases armor for each relic held!

76.name: Horned Halo
76.effect: Revive with low health when defeated but consumes half of current health when picked up! This relic is destroyed on use.

78.name: Hunter's Stiletto
78.effect: Increase damage against foes that are inflicted with a status ailment.

79.name: Hyperbolic Train
79.effect: Signature charges faster at low health!

80.name: Idealist's Mirror
80.effect: All arcana are empowered when at full health!

82.name: Igniting Sprite Vesa
82.effect: Summons a sprite that burns enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.

83.name: Indra's Copper Pipe
83.effect: Increases duration of your shock status effects!

84.name: Infinity Marble
84.effect: Signature charge stays active until used!

85.name: Insignia of Legend
85.effect: A crest presented only to those who have cleared the Chaos Trials!

86.name: Jewelry Box
86.effect: Picking up chaos gems heals for a small amount. Excludes gems collected from Council members.

87.name: Journal of Midas
87.effect: Gain gold when defeating consecutive enemies without taking damage!

88.name: Kali's Flower Diadem
88.effect: When taking damage that would defeat you, gain full signature charge and briefly become immune to defeat!

89.name: Large Red Button
89.effect: Regain full health every time an exit portal is used! Max health is reduced and health potions have no effect.

91.name: Lei's Drum
91.effect: Release a burst of lightning when taking damage!

92.name: Limited Edition Robe
92.effect: Reduces damage taken to a maximum of 10% of max health!

93.name: Lotus Froststone
93.effect: Summons an aura that freezes nearby enemies.

94.name: Memory Chainmail
94.effect: Memorizes the last three attacks taken and reduces damage from attacks of the same type!

95.name: Merchant's Cart
95.effect: Increase damage based on number of relics in inventory.

97.name: Messy Prescription
97.effect: Increases healing received from all sources!

98.name: Mirror Shield
98.effect: Summons a shield that reflects one projectile!

99.name: Museum Ticket
99.effect: A ticket to Lanova Museum's newly opened Chaos Trials exhibit!

101.name: Nerite Shell
101.effect: Adds a chance to slow foes!

102.name: Neve's Citrine
102.effect: Holding seven lightning arcana increases critical chance! All arcana shocks foes!

103.name: Neve's Emerald
103.effect: Holding seven earth arcana increase health and armor and lowers stun and knockback!

104.name: Neve's Quartz
104.effect: Holding seven air arcana increases movement speed and evasion. All arcana slows foes!

105.name: Neve's Ruby
105.effect: Holding seven fire arcana increases damage! All arcana burns foes!

106.name: Neve's Sapphire
106.effect: Holding seven water arcana reduces all cooldowns and increases healing!

107.name: Nocturnal Sundial
107.effect: Adds a chance that an arcana will not go on cooldown after use!

108.name: Nog's Heavenly Boots
108.effect: Adds a significant chance to evade attacks but take double damage!

109.name: Noxious Dappercap
109.effect: Adds a chance to poison foes!

110.name: Ominous Loan Note
110.effect: Immediately receive a large sum of gold! All gold gained, with interest, will go toward paying off this debt.

111.name: Overpriced Insurance
111.effect: Expend all gold at the start of each stage and heal for a fraction of the expended amount.

112.name: Paronomasicon
112.effect: Your attacks on council members are more pun-ishing! Enemy attacks pack an extra pun-ch.

113.name: Pathfinder's Knapsack
113.effect: On clearing the floor, receive a heal based on the map reveal percentage.

114.name: Pathfinder's Map
114.effect: Reveals the layout and main points of interest of the Chaos Trials!

115.name: Pazu's Favorite Hat
115.effect: Revive with low health when defeated! Hat can also create health orbs when dropped. This relic is destroyed on use.

116.name: Perfect Time Crystal
116.effect: Signature damage, charge rate, and decay rate increased!

117.name: Permafrost Cube
117.effect: Adds a chance to freeze foes!

118.name: Phoenix Talon
118.effect: Adds a chance to burn foes!

119.name: Phyyrnx's Hourglass
119.effect: Designed by Artisan PerdyDarnSavvy, this relic activates when taking damage at low health and briefly removes the cooldown on all arcana!

120.name: Plaguing Sprite Dria
120.effect: Summons a sprite that poisons enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.

121.name: Poem of Fiery Rime
121.effect: Increases fire and ice damage! Adds a chance to freeze and burn foes to fire and ice arcana, respectively.

122.name: Pop-up Primer
122.effect: Increases the number of summoned agents, but lowers their health!

124.name: Raffle Ticket
124.effect: Adds a chance that an item purchased in the Chaos Trials will be free of charge.

126.name: Reactive Vinemail
126.effect: Releases a grove of rooting vines when taking damage!

127.name: Regenerative Inkwell
127.effect: Using a fully charged signature arcana heals you instead of producing a signature spell!

128.name: Reinforced Bracers
128.effect: Your projectiles destroy any other projectiles they strike!

129.name: Relic Rewards Card
129.effect: All gold costs for relics are discounted!

130.name: Renewing Potion Vial
130.effect: Regain a small amount of health when teleporting to the next area!

131.name: Resolute Svalinn
131.effect: Increases resistance to fire based attacks!

132.name: Ring of Recycling
132.effect: Gain a shield every time a charged signature is not activated and times out.

133.name: Ring of Reserves
133.effect: Adds more uses to all multi-use arcana!

135.name: Royal Flush
135.effect: Equipping arcana of the same element increases damage!

137.name: Sano's Headband
137.effect: You can no longer be interrupted while casting an arcana!

138.name: Scissors of Vitality
138.effect: Sacrifice all standard arcana in your hand to revive from defeat!

139.name: Secret Wild Card
139.effect: Your signature will take longer to charge, but can now be used twice on a single charge!

140.name: Sharpened Stylus
140.effect: Increases damage but signature can no longer be charged!

142.name: Sidewinder's Badge
142.effect: All melee basic arcana have a secondary hit that deals reduced damage!

143.name: Silver Spinning Top
143.effect: Increases the activation speed of arcana but slows movement speed!

144.name: Singing Bowl
144.effect: Not using arcana for a short period of time causes your next spell to be a critical hit!

145.name: Sinister Ledger
145.effect: Designed by Artisan Steven Wu, this relic increases all damage for every enemy defeated, but loses effectiveness when taking damage.

146.name: Sleepy Thunderstone
146.effect: Summons an aura that calls down lightning on nearby enemies.

147.name: Sparking Sprite Etra
147.effect: Summons a sprite that shocks enemies! Only one sprite can be active at any time.

148.name: Special Snowflake
148.effect: Defeated enemies have a chance to explode and freeze nearby enemies!

149.name: Spell Thief's Socks
149.effect: Increase movement speed everytime an arcana is used! Speed is increased for each arcana on cooldown!

150.name: Spice Rack
150.effect: Using an arcana of a different element reduces the cooldown of the previously used arcana.

151.name: Spiked Emergency Kit
151.effect: Regenerate health while at critically low health! Max health is reduced.

152.name: Stanza of Flames
152.effect: All fire arcana cause burning but take double damage from water spells! Second half of the Poem of Fiery Rime.

153.name: Stanza of Frost
153.effect: Increases ice damage! First half of the Poem of Fiery Rime.

154.name: Stygian Turtle Shell
154.effect: Briefly become invulnerable after taking damage in quick succession!

155.name: Super Carrot Cake
155.effect: Taking damage increases your max health up to a certain limit!

157.name: Supply Crate
157.effect: The relic and arcana stores will instantly restock after purchase! Health potions are of short supply and will not be restocked.

158.name: Surefire Rocket
158.effect: Signature charge no longer decays while building up!

159.name: Takeout Box
159.effect: When healed for more than your maximum health, gain a shield equal to half of the excess heal amount.

160.name: Tapping Gloves
160.effect: Following up a basic arcana with another arcana increases its critical hit chance!

161.name: Tea of Mercy
161.effect: All heals increase your max health up to a certain limit!

163.name: Tesla Coil
163.effect: Adds a chance to shock foes!

164.name: Thesis on Defense
164.effect: Every point of damage taken adds a page to this thesis. Every 200 pages reduces all damage taken by 1. (Maximum 1000 pages)

165.name: Three Gorges Bulwark
165.effect: Increases resistance to water based attacks!

166.name: Tiny Crocodile Heart
166.effect: Reduces max health but increases max health for each enemy defeated!

168.name: Tozy's Pocket Watch
168.effect: Designed by Artisan Curt 'Tozy' Toczydlowski, this relic reduces cooldowns but also reduces signature charge rate!

169.name: Tracking Suit
169.effect: Arcana of matching elements increases resistance to that element! Requires two or more arcana of the same element.

171.name: Vampire's Eyeglasses
171.effect: Regenerate health every time you land a critical hit!

172.name: Vampire's Fangs
172.effect: Defeating enemies regenerates health but max health is reduced!

173.name: Volatile Gemstone
173.effect: Signature charge rate and decay are increased dramatically but charged signature damage is reduced! Shell of the Perfect Time Crystal.

174.name: Wallet of Vigor
174.effect: Enables you to purchase items with health when you don't have sufficient gold.

175.name: Wanderer's Mechanism
175.effect: Increases the damage of your signature arcana! Core of the Perfect Time Crystal.

176.name: Whimsical Explodium
176.effect: Adds a chance that enemies will explode when defeated!

177.name: Yuna's Storybook
177.effect: Increases the duration of summoned agents!

1.name: Air Burst
1.effect: Dash forward on a burst of air!
1.enhanced: Creates shockwaves that buffet foes in your path!

2.name: Air Spinner
2.effect: Throw a disc of air into orbit around you!
2.enhanced: Throws two discs at the same time!

3.name: Airborne Slam
3.effect: Rocket into the sky on an air jet before slamming into the ground to create a violent burst of wind!
3.enhanced: Creates smaller wind bursts that ripples forward after impact!

4.name: Breaking Twister
4.effect: Unleash a slow moving burst of air that slows and damages all nearby enemies!
4.enhanced: Twister stops shortly after being unleashed but continues to spin in place!

5.name: Cyclone Boomerang
5.effect: Hurl a rapidly revolving air current that returns to you!
5.enhanced: Creates an additional boomerang before returning to you!

6.name: Dragon Blast
6.effect: Summon a dragon formed of wind to draw in enemies before blasting them away!

7.name: Evading Zephyr
7.effect: Summon a current of air that causes all incoming attacks to miss while you are moving or using basic arcana!
7.enhanced: Increases movement speed and allows you to run over pits!

8.name: Furious Tempest
8.effect: Hold to charge up and release a stormy ball of wind that implodes at maximum charge!

9.name: Gust Burst
9.effect: Dash forward with such force that enemies in the area are pulled into your wake!
9.enhanced: Creates a secondary burst on landing!

10.name: Gust Volley
10.effect: Release a volley of piercing winds in a cone!

11.name: Heroic Leap
11.effect: Designed by Virtuoso Michael Belloy, this arcana allows you to seize a foe and leap high into the air before crashing down!
11.enhanced: Increases the distance at which you can grab foes!

12.name: Mach Stunner
12.effect: Fire off a series of sound waves that stun any enemies they strike!

13.name: Mentis Imperium
13.effect: Designed by Virtuoso Claire Astrid, this arcana allows you to confuse foes around you, causing them to attack each other!

14.name: Rushing Typhoon
14.effect: Fly forward with a ring of tumbling winds that locks onto the first enemy struck!

15.name: Scales of Babylon
15.effect: Designed by Virtuoso Sean 'Ariamaki' Riedinger, this arcana allows you to lower active cooldowns and steal speed from enemies by blasting them with a burst of air!

16.name: Shearing Chain
16.effect: Rush forward while unleashing a flurry of wind slashes!
16.enhanced: Slashes are larger and more numerous!

17.name: Spiraling Typhoon
17.effect: Draw in foes with a ring of tumbling winds before striking them away!
17.enhanced: Increases tumble duration and final blow knocks foes further away!

18.name: Storm Draft
18.effect: Release a burst of air that drafts foes and stuns them against walls!

19.name: Tearing Whirlwind
19.effect: Rapidly spin forward and pull nearby enemies into your wake!
19.enhanced: Move and spin even faster, dealing more damage!

20.name: Ward of Winds
20.effect: Summon a ward of air that slows enemies and increases all air damage done in the area!
20.enhanced: Ward area is increased and also increases fire damage done in the area!

21.name: Whirling Tornado
21.effect: Unleash a protective vortex of fierce winds!

22.name: Whirling Wind Agent
22.effect: Conjure an agent of wind that buffets foes with whirling winds!
22.enhanced: Agents move and attack more quickly!

23.name: Wind Flurry
23.effect: Unleash a quick salvo of cutting winds!
23.enhanced: Projectiles pierce enemies but attack range is lowered!

24.name: Wind Slash
24.enhanced: Final slash creates a piercing wind that negates projectiles!

25.name: Absolute Finale
25.effect: Throws out an orb of primal chaos that erases the first enemy hit from existence! Enemies that cannot be erased will take heavy damage instead.

26.name: Arcane Intervention
26.effect: Designed by Virtuoso Kaleb Daugherty, this arcana allows you teleport all nearby enemies into a chaos storm!

27.name: Chaos Crusher
27.effect: Create a chaotic rift to strike foes before compressing it and firing it forward!

28.name: Chaotic Rift
28.effect: Dash through a rift torn open by primal chaos!

29.name: Distortion Beam
29.effect: Summon a beam of chaos energy!

30.name: Mortal Coil
30.effect: Designed by Virtuoso Nathan 'MortisXII' Cannell, this arcana allows you to impale all enemies in a line with a spear of chaos and drag them to you!

31.name: Null Parade
31.effect: Throw out a cluster of chaos orbs that explode on landing!

32.name: Phantom Brigade
32.effect: Summon a legion of Chaos Knights that rush forth and attack enemies!

33.name: Aegis Charge
33.effect: Shield incoming attacks as you charge forward, stunning enemies in your path!
33.enhanced: Increases the durability, damage, and speed of your aegis!

34.name: Dragon Dive
34.effect: Summon a tunneling dragon that drives away foes!
34.enhanced: Summons dual dragons that travel further!

35.name: Earth Knuckles
35.effect: Pummel foes with gigantic earth fists!
35.enhanced: Becomes a single hit arcana with an even bigger fist!

36.name: Earth Stomp Agent
36.effect: Conjure an agent of earth that crushes foes!

37.name: Earthen Aegis
37.effect: Form a protective ring of stone shields!

38.name: Earthquake Axe
38.effect: Hurl a giant stone axe into the air that crashes down on enemies!
38.enhanced: Increases damage and crash area of axes!

39.name: Embracing Vines
39.effect: Cultivate a row of entwining vines that roots foes!
39.enhanced: Vines poison any foes they root!

40.name: Fadeaway Rhythm
40.effect: Mark foes with a series of rocky strikes that explode as you leap back!
40.enhanced: Adds an extra strike to the rhythm!

41.name: Grasping Earth
41.effect: Designed by Virtuoso Laurent Sweert, this arcana allows you to grasp all foes in the area with giant stone fists!
41.enhanced: Starts off at max radius and crushes enemies more quickly!

42.name: Knockout Boulder
42.effect: Hurl a boulder that stuns foes!
42.enhanced: Boulder explodes on impact and damages nearby foes!

43.name: Magnetic Follow-up
43.effect: Generates a magnetic aura that causes basic arcana to hurl stone projectiles!
43.enhanced: Instantly summons a ring of stones that briefly stuns enemies they strike!

44.name: Obsidian Cascade
44.effect: Unleash a cascade of obsidian daggers!
44.enhanced: Daggers deal more damage and stun enemies!

45.name: Rippling Rupture
45.effect: Rupture the earth with rapidly tunneling vines to continually damage enemies in a line!
45.enhanced: Increases rippling duration and distance covered by vines!

46.name: Rock n' Roll
46.effect: Summon a pair of rocky buzzsaws that tear forward!

47.name: Seismic Entry
47.effect: Launch into the air and crash down on all nearby foes to stun them!
47.enhanced: Launches even higher and summons rippling earth waves on landing!

48.name: Shattering Strike
48.effect: Strike a boulder to shatter it into a ring of shrapnel!

49.name: Spike Track
49.effect: Tear forward and leave behind a trail of earthen spikes!
49.enhanced: Spikes continue to form even after dash is complete!

50.name: Stalwart Defenders
50.effect: Designed by Virtuosos Shamrock63 and Slamuel, this arcana allows you to form a quartet of chess knights that leap to your defense!
50.enhanced: Knights jump in place for a secondary shock after their initial leap!

51.name: Stone Shot
51.enhanced: Reduces damage but shoots two stones at a time!

52.name: Tectonic Drill
52.effect: Drive forward and rock enemies with a giant drill made of stone!

53.name: Terra Ring
53.effect: Pulverize the ground to summon cascading rings of earth spikes!
53.enhanced: Summons all rings simultaneously but deals less damage overall!

54.name: Toxic Bolas
54.effect: Hurl bolas made of toxic vines to entangle and poison foes!
54.enhanced: Bolas no longer stop upon hitting a foe!

55.name: Toxic Trap
55.effect: Tear forward while throwing behind a toxic bomb that poisons foes!
55.enhanced: Throw an extra toxic bomb forward!

56.name: Ward of Stones
56.effect: Form a ward of earth that periodically stuns foes and increases all earth damage done in the area!
56.enhanced: Ward area is increased and also increases air damage done in the area!

57.name: Blazing Blitz
57.effect: Dash forward and pummel a foe with barrage of fiery punches!

58.name: Blazing Lariat
58.effect: Spin forward while swinging a blazing whip of flames!

59.name: Blazing Onslaught
59.effect: Dash forward, grabbing all enemies in your path before unleashing an onslaught of fireballs!

60.name: Blazing Vault
60.effect: Blast into the air and come crashing down into a fiery explosion!
60.enhanced: Start the vault with an explosive bang!

62.name: Crashing Meteor
62.effect: Call down a meteor from the skies!

63.name: Dragon Arc
63.effect: Summon a torrent of fiery dragons!
63.enhanced: Fires two dragons simultaneously and increases number of charges!

64.name: Exploding Fireball
64.effect: Fire a massive fireball that explodes on impact!

65.name: Explosive Charge
65.effect: Charge through enemies, marking them with a timed explosive!

66.name: Fire Wall
66.effect: Ignite the ground to create a blazing trail of flames!
66.enhanced: Wall forms quicker and extends further!

67.name: Flame Breath
67.effect: Blast away enemies with a breath of fire!

68.name: Flame Cleaver
68.effect: Carve out a wave of flames that ignites all enemies in its path!
68.enhanced: Cleave with both hands to create a wider wave that travels further!

69.name: Flame Fusion
69.effect: Fire off a fireball, followed by a flaming arrow that can be fused to release a burst of arrows!

70.name: Flame Strike
70.effect: Blast enemies away with plumes of flames!
70.enhanced: Executes quicker and affects a larger area!

71.name: Flare Rush
71.effect: Rush forward and conjure a volley of accompanying flares!

72.name: Fuelled Berserk
72.effect: Enter a burning rage that speeds up basic arcana!
72.enhanced: Explodes when activated to burn foes in the area!

73.name: Homing Flares
73.effect: Ignite a halo of flares that home in on the nearest foe!
73.enhanced: Summons additional flares and increases duration!

74.name: Ignition Drive
74.effect: Blast enemies away with a chain of explosions!
74.enhanced: Final explosion ignites the area on fire!

75.name: Raging Inferno
75.effect: Hold to charge up and release an expanding ball of fire that explodes at maximum charge!

76.name: Rapid Fire Agent
76.effect: Conjure an agent of fire that engages foes with a rapid barrage of fireballs!
76.enhanced: Agents attack more often but deals less damage!

77.name: Searing Crown
77.effect: Blast away enemies around you with a burning halo of flames!
77.enhanced: Flames last longer, dealing more damage!

78.name: Searing Rush
78.effect: Rush forward and leave flames in your wake!
78.enhanced: Adds an explosion on landing that burns foes!

79.name: Tracer Barrage
79.effect: Fire off a volley of arcing tracers that return to you!
79.enhanced: Tracers are larger and more numerous!

80.name: Ward of Flames
80.effect: Form a ward of fire that damages enemies and increases all fire damage done in the area!
80.enhanced: Ward area is increased and also increases water damage done in the area!

81.name: Arc Sphere
81.effect: Generate a stationary sphere of arcing current!
81.enhanced: Sphere is larger and has a longer duration!

82.name: Ball Lightning
82.effect: Hold to charge up and release a devastating ball of lightning that shocks at maximum charge!

83.name: Bolt Claymore
83.effect: Release a charged orb that can be detonated to strike all nearby foes with lightning!
83.enhanced: Greatly increases the orb's maximum area of effect!

84.name: Bolt Rail
84.effect: Direct a short stream of lightning!
84.enhanced: Final burst is larger and shocks foes!

85.name: Bouncing Surge
85.effect: Conjure a spear of lightning that bounces between enemies!
85.enhanced: Spear bounces more times and shocks for a longer duration!

86.name: Circuit Line
86.effect: Jolt ahead, leaving behind electric orbs that are chained together after a short delay!

87.name: Deferred Dynamo
87.effect: Send out an electric orb that fires a continuous lightning stream at the first enemy it strikes!
87.enhanced: Lightning stream pushes enemies back twice as far!

88.name: Ion Spike
88.effect: Generate a charged orb that syncs up with nearby orbs before releasing a stream of lightning!
88.enhanced: Orbs fire both forwards and backwards!

89.name: Lightning Aspect
89.effect: Generate a field of electricity that shocks enemies that you come into contact with!

90.name: Line Shock Agent
90.effect: Conjure an agent of lightning that assaults foes with a stream of lightning!
90.enhanced: Lightning streams last longer and deal more damage!

91.name: Magsphere
91.effect: Designed by Virtuoso David Gottsegen, this arcana allows you to pull all nearby projectiles into an orbit around you!

92.name: Shock Assault
92.effect: Ride a bolt of lightning to shock foes in the area!

93.name: Shock Line
93.effect: Jolt ahead and leave behind a line of shocking current!
93.enhanced: Throws an additional shock line in front you!

94.name: Shock Nova
94.effect: Hold to charge up and release an explosion of electricity that shocks all foes in the area at maximum charge!
94.enhanced: Nova charges up faster and has an increased radius!

95.name: Shock Wire
95.effect: Throw out a wire of current that shocks any enemies that it comes into contact with!
95.enhanced: Wire is longer and expands more quickly!

96.name: Spark Array
96.effect: Form a double weave of shocking sparks that slowly move outward!
96.enhanced: Sparks fire a lightning stream back to you when they dissipate!

97.name: Spark Contact
97.effect: Jolt foes with a burst of electricity!
97.enhanced: Final blow creates a shocking electric blast!

98.name: Star Bolt
98.effect: Hurl an electrified star that shocks any enemy it strikes!
98.enhanced: Stars shock for a longer duration!

99.name: Surge Anchor
99.effect: Throws out an anchor that generates a surge of lightning between you and the anchor!
99.enhanced: Anchor lasts longer and creates more streams!

100.name: Thunder Drop
100.effect: Volt into the sky before crashing down on a bolt of lightning to shock all foes in the area!

101.name: Thundering Chain
101.effect: Generate a series of lightning strikes that shock foes!

102.name: Volt Pinball
102.effect: Generate a protective ring of charged orbs that ricochet from foe to foe!
102.enhanced: Pinballs last longer and have more ricochet charges!

103.name: Voltaic Needle
103.effect: Dart forward and pin all foes in your path with a piercing lightning needle!
103.enhanced: Dart forward quicker with a more powerful needle!

104.name: Ward of Lightning
104.effect: Summon a lightning ward that shocks foes randomly and increases all lightning damage done in the area!
104.enhanced: Ward area is increased and also increases earth damage done in the area!

105.name: Aqua Arc
105.effect: Direct an arcing stream of water!
105.enhanced: Unleashes a burst of ice on impact!

106.name: Aqua Beam
106.effect: Unleash a torrent of water to blast away enemies!

107.name: Aqua Breaker
107.effect: Hold to charge up and release a rapidly spinning ball of water that creates an explosive deluge at maximum charge!

108.name: Aqua Vortex
108.effect: Summon swirling currents of water that envelop you!
108.enhanced: Unleashes a final burst of freezing ice!

109.name: Binary Splashdown
109.effect: Throw out a burst of water that draws in foes before blasting into the sky and splashing down!

110.name: Bouncing Bubble
110.effect: Throw out a bubble of water that bounces every time it strikes an enemy or wall!
110.enhanced: Increases bubble speed and number of times it can strike enemies!

111.name: Bubble Barrage
111.effect: Rapidly fire a stream of explosive bubbles!
111.enhanced: Bubbles are larger and deal more damage!

112.name: Cardice Prime
112.effect: Conjure a rapidly revolving ring of icy blades!
112.enhanced: Conjures additional blades and all blades fly outward when released!

113.name: Creeping Tendrils
113.effect: Designed by Virtuoso Verdestrom, this arcana creates a tendril of water that binds and travels to any foes it hits!
113.enhanced: Tendrils spin faster and deal more damage!

114.name: Frost Fan
114.effect: Throw out a fan of frost daggers that freeze enemies!
114.enhanced: Daggers fly further and pierce through enemies!

115.name: Frost Feint
115.effect: Race forward while leaving behind a frozen decoy!
115.enhanced: Leaves an extra decoy at the end of the dash!

116.name: Frozen Bait
116.effect: Lob a frozen decoy that lures in foes and giant sharks alike!
116.enhanced: Lures a larger shark for increased damage!

117.name: Glacial Cross
117.effect: Dash forward and conjure a colossal frozen fist to strike foes!
117.enhanced: Fist explodes and fires off a cone of ice shards!

118.name: Ice Dagger
118.effect: Pierce foes with conjured ice daggers!
118.enhanced: Throws out a piercing dagger on the final strike!

119.name: Ice Seekers
119.effect: Summon a trio of seekers that home in on and freeze nearby enemies!

120.name: Ice Spear
120.effect: Conjure a spear of ice that impales foes and freezes them against walls!
120.enhanced: Spear is larger, moves faster, and deals more damage!

121.name: Perfect Storm
121.effect: Summon a storm of hail and ice shards that rains down on foes!

122.name: Rebounding Icicles
122.effect: Conjure a series of icicles that cascade out and return to you!

123.name: Snowflake Chakrams
123.effect: Conjure snowflake chakrams that orbit outwards!
123.enhanced: Chakrams orbit back inwards after expanding!

124.name: Tidal Blast
124.effect: Pull in enemies with a series of water balls before blasting them away with a massive deluge!
124.enhanced: Summons an additional water ball to shield you while casting!

125.name: Ward of Frost
125.effect: Form a ward of frost that periodically freezes foes and increases all water damage done in the area!
125.enhanced: Ward area is increased and also increases lightning damage done in the area!

126.name: Water Prison
126.effect: Fire off a prison of water that envelops the first enemy it strikes!
126.enhanced: Gain an extra prison charge and increases the prison's speed!

127.name: Water Pulse Agent
127.effect: Conjure an agent of water that douses foes with a spread of water blobs!
127.enhanced: Adds more water blobs for a wider spread shot!

128.name: Wave Front
128.effect: Race forward while enveloped in a watery globe that briefly shields you!
